description:
Eastern Jin’s Regent had icy, jade-like beauty and peerless talent. Rumors said that his admirers were enough to fill 3 entire cities!

The Regent was only second to the Emperor with great power in his hand. He was known for being temperamental and being mysophobic, never touching any females.

One day, a peculiar rumor was spread, claiming that a young fox entered his bathroom and actually didn’t die. Surprisingly, he loved and cared for the fox. He even held the fox as he slept!

You’re a false god! I’m a human. Ah! How dare you turn me into a fox in my transmigration, letting some guy take liberties with me every day? Fine! Since it ended up like this, I will take what’s his, play him like a toy, and bed him…>
